parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: The output information of the task whose execution success you want to report.

parameters.name: RequestId
parameters.description: The request ID. If you specify this parameter, the system uses this value as the ID of the request. If you do not specify this parameter, the system generates a value at random.

parameters.name: TaskToken
parameters.description: The token of the task whose execution success you want to report. If this parameter appears in **waitforCallback** mode, the parameter is passed to the called service, such as Message Service (MNS) or Function Compute. For MNS, the value of this parameter can be obtained from the message. For Function Compute, the value of this parameter can be obtained from the event.
